title: Asgarnian ale (Player-owned house)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Asgarnian ale is a variant of Asgarnian ale that can be obtained in a Player-owned house. Players can obtain it by using an empty beer glass on an Asgarnian ale barrel, which can be built in the kitchen of a player-owned house.

Asgarnian ale is a variant of Asgarnian ale that can be obtained in a Player-owned house. Players can obtain it by using an empty beer glass on an Asgarnian ale barrel, which can be built in the kitchen of a player-owned house.

It functions the same as the regular drink, but will disappear from the player's inventory upon leaving the house.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 February 2015
(update)

The item was made members-only.

31 May 2006
(update)

The item was made obtainable with the release of Construction.

28 March 2006
(update)

The item was added to the game cache, but was unobtainable.

[[File:Asgarnian ale (Player-owned house) detail.png|left|150x150px]]
'''Asgarnian ale''' is a variant of [[Asgarnian ale]] that can be obtained in a [[Player-owned house]]. Players can obtain it by using an [[Beer glass (Player-owned house)|empty beer glass]] on an [[Asgarnian ale (barrel)|Asgarnian ale barrel]], which can be built in the [[kitchen]] of a player-owned house.

It functions the same as the regular drink, but will disappear from the player's inventory upon leaving the house.
